headline: LyondellBasell Industries (LYB): A Resilient Choice Among Safest High Dividend Stocks
summary: LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) is included among the 10 Safest High Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) is a leading global producer of chemicals, plastics, and polymers that are used in everything from packaging and automotive components to construction materials. With major production facilities in North America and Europe, the company’s core […]
